resources: About VanillaOS Your tablet is almost ready to enjoy VanillaOS. Our CyanogenMod based open source project strives to perform fast and user friendly with a lot of custom options added. Big thank you to every Rom we got code from such as Paranoid Android, AOKP or SlimRoms for example. If you are facing any issue, feel free to contact us on our g+ community :) %s. Your phone is almost ready to enjoy VanillaOS. Our CyanogenMod based open source project strives to perform fast and user friendly with a lot of custom options added. Big thank you to every Rom we got code from such as Paranoid Android, AOKP or SlimRoms for example. If you are facing any issue, feel free to contact us on our g+ community :) %s.
